resources.string: Help us to help you save money
Have something here about the daily bills/maybe what you have left of your budget for the month?

Maybe have a button in here to update the daily schedule once bills have been paid? Example: Get notified of internet bill, pay bill via banking app, but it will still show up on our app given we arent asking for that kind of info, so check of it has been paid with a click?
To get started with building a budget we must begin with your monthly income
Use the below buttons to manage the current items in your budget
